members.name: Rob Viglione
members.title: Team Lead
members.bio:
Rob is a former physicist and mathematician with experience working on Bitshares, BlockPay, Zclassic, Seasteading and Bitgate. He's currently a PhD Candidate in Finance researching cryptofinance and teaching “Bitcoin & Blockchain Applications in Finance.

Rob holds an MBA in Finance & Marketing and the PMP certification. He is a passionate libertarian who advocates peace, freedom, and respect for individual life.

members.name: Rolf Versluis
members.title: Chief Engineer
members.bio:
Rolf is an experienced business owner in the IT industry and owns a mid-size mining operation.

With prior experience at Cisco systems, the semiconductor industry, and as a nuclear trained officer in the US Submarine force, Rolf brings leadership, management, and technical operational expertise to the Zen organization

members.name: Alberto Garoffolo
members.title: Sr Software Architect
members.bio:
With more than 15 years of experience Alberto gained a deep knowledge on software design and development in many application fields with a strong expertise in different languages such as Java, C and C++.

In the last years he covered the role of CTO in a startup company, designing the software architecture and selecting the team to create one of the most complete video engagement solutions on the market.

members.name: Pier Stabilini
members.title: Software Manager
members.bio: Pier started using a computer at age 11 learning Basic and 6502 Assembly on Apple II. Today he has 20+ years of experience in software architecture and development with a strong Java, J2EE, C, GoLang, Python, data grid and networking expertise. Pier has designed and developed real time networking frameworks and high performance stacks used in financial applications, audio and video conference and in the automotive industry. His main areas of interest are cryptocurrencies, decentralized and distributed systems, networking protocols, audio and video encoders, embedded devices, kernel and system programming.

members.name: Pierre Schiro
members.title: Sr Software Developer
members.bio:
Pierre Schiro is an experienced, hands-on software architect and software engineering manager. He’s involved in the architecture, design, and implementation of micro-services architectures, service-oriented architectures, and distributed systems. He has been in the software industry for over 26 years and has significant experience and expertise in application, integration, and enterprise architecture. After several leadership roles at Yahoo, Pierre co-founded Code Particle Inc in 2008 where he applied his skills on a wide range of projects including MVP for early-stage startups, web-services API for mobile digital games supporting millions of players, and massive, high-availability, distributed applications for clients such as Activision, Crowdstrike and Tenable.

Pierre holds a bachelor’s degree in computer science from IUT Lyon 1.

members.name: Franck De Girolami
members.title: Sr Software Developer
members.bio:
Franck has over 25 years of experience in high performance software application development including extensive work in video games for PC, console and mobile platforms.  As software architect and lead programmer, Franck was directly responsible for a number of groundbreaking video games including Alone in the Dark, Cyberia and Tron 2.0: Killer App. Franck co-founded Code Particle, Inc. in 2008 as an advanced web and mobile application development studio in Los Angeles, CA where his skills were applied on revolutionary mobile apps like Viddy and high-end distributed applications for companies such as Activision (Call of Duty), Crowdstrike, Tenable and LINE (Skullgirls). Additionally, Franck is also in charge of all corporate, finance, legal, and HR matters at Code Particle.

Franck received his MS in Computer Science in 1993 from National Institute of Applied Sciences (INSA) in Villeurbanne, France, one of the top French engineering universities.

members.name: Nicola Onassis
members.title: Sr Software Developer
members.bio:
Nicola is an experienced technical manager with 20 years of software engineering and 15+ years of architecture development. His work spans many aspects of technology development –from web platform architecture to system integration, database architecture to data warehousing, API architecture to system engineering, and more. Nicola co-founded Code Particle with De Girolami and Schiro and since then has been in charge of training and mentoring new developers and interns, leading the client side and database team, architecting platforms for different startups like Viddy, Symptify, Boldride, integration system and UI frameworks for different customers like Crowdstrike, Tenable, Activision.

Nicola expertise is in Database architecture (both SQL and no-SQL) and clients side UI-X frameworks implementation.

members.name: Idan Gelbourt
members.title: Sr Software Developer
members.bio:
Idan has been involved with security, cyber and crypto related project in various roles and is passionate about creating products that combine unique technologies and user experience.

Idan holds a B.Sc & M.Sc in computer science and worked in startups that were acquired by Facebook and Apple.

members.name: William Wolf
members.title: Sr Software Developer
members.bio: Professional developer/engineer for 12+ years, currently leading payments engineering team at Airbnb. Will has worked on the founding teams of several startups, grown and managed engineering teams from 1 to 30+, built scalable high-volume web-based email hosting solutions, a distributed, scalable cloud computing platform called OpenStack, and global payments systems and infrastructure. Will has been involved in Bitcoin and the crypto space since 2011 and has made contributions to many open source blockchain tools, libraries, and systems.

members.name: Allan Dumaine
members.title: Sr Software Developer
members.bio: A seasoned professional with over 28 years experience in Information Technology including a variety of executive level roles.  His broad technical background and expertise helps in translating difficult concepts into simple designs and transforming complex business processes into practical software solutions. As a serial entrepreneur, he has been a partner in numerous start-ups and continues to enjoy exploring new opportunities helping organizations create solid business foundations. He is excited to be a part of building the next generation of financial infrastructure and optimistic about the resulting societal changes. In his off time Allan can be found swimming, hiking or mountain biking.

members.name: Joseph Nicholas Alcantara
members.title: Software Developer
members.bio: Joseph has been in the retail and finance industry for 5 years. He has helped develop applications for the self checkout machines and integrated devices for these. A graduate of Silliman University, majoring in Computer Engineering, he strongly believes that through his experience and expertise, he can help the Zen Team better by creating new innovations. And having the skills and knowledge on embedded systems programming, he can create and integrate applications to work not only on platform level, but on hardware, as well. Joseph joined the Zen Team because his beliefs align with what Zen stands for: privacy and security.

members.name: Kendrick Tan
members.title: Software Developer
members.bio: Kendrick is a self taught programmer and his areas of interests are machine learning, blockchain, functional programming, and infosec. Doing his free time, he has built a brainfuck interpreter in haskell, a self driving RC car, as well as a face indexer for instagram. He also likes taking photos of his favorite feline: https://www.instagram.com/mr.miso.oz/

members.name: Lukáš Bureš
members.title: Software Developer
members.bio: Lukáš is currently a Ph.D. candidate in Cybernetics at the University of West Bohemia and has an MSc in Cybernetics and Artificial Intelligence. He is interested in blockchain technologies, cryptocurrencies, artificial intelligence, security, machine learning, data mining, and computer vision. Lukáš is fully proficiency in many programming languages and with many development libraries and tools. He is a business owner in the IT industry and owns a mid-size mining operation.

members.name: Cronic
members.title: Infrastructure Manager
members.bio: cronic is an experienced Linux sysadmin who originally started off in the telecommunications industry. He specializes in virtualization technologies, storage and application containerization. He'll be supporting the Dev Team with creating and running a continuous deployment pipeline and make sure the infrastructure keeps running. He's passionate about privacy in the digital age and prefers to stay pseudonymous.

members.name: James McCourt Cordingley (Mac)
members.title: Infrastructure
members.bio: Mac spent the last 8 years developing asset integrity and risk management systems for the oil and gas industry. An experienced linux sysadmin and database technologies professional with many years development experience. Having come from a heavily service-oriented business, Mac decided to contribute to the Zen team initially as a voluntary community member, following which he began guiding the build and operation of both the ZenHelp desk and knowledge base.

members.name: Jake Tarren
members.title: Infrastructure
members.bio: Jake is a volunteer with the development team. He's currently heading up the communications and outreach for the dev team, and plans on taking on more development intensive roles. His day job is a Red Team Engineer at NASA, where he routinely breaks things.

members.name: Johncarlo Maddalena
members.title: Testing
members.bio:
Has 19 years of IT experience and has loved computers since his Commodore 64.  He began in career in IT working as a technical customer support representative for one of Australia’s largest Internet Service Providers.  He worked up through the ranks and specialized in network supporting a Network Operations Centre responsible for monitoring and supporting over 30 clients and 5000 devices. After a move to a new city and exposure to the new Microsoft Installer technologies, he transitioned to applications packaging, and quality assurance and testing.

He’s spent the last 15 years troubleshooting, resolving, and quality controlling deployed applications in various deployment environments (AD/GP, Citrix Metaframe/Presentation Server, SCCM 2007, and SCCM 2012). He holds a  Bachelor of Pharmaceutical Science and Bachelor of Applied Sciences (Honour) degrees.

members.name: Spencer Whetstone
members.title: Testing
members.bio: A graduate of the University of South Carolina School of Business, Spencer spent much of his career navigating the technological waves that reshaped the printing industry. His background includes a partnership in an award-winning typography studio and service bureau, as well as Technology Director for a medium-sized commercial printer. He is a cryptocurrency miner and a Secure Node operator. He brings his long-standing passion for user-education to his role as Community Manager and QA  Engineer.

members.name: Gustavo Fialho
members.title: User Experience Director
members.bio: Gustavo is a web developer and entrepreneur with extensive experience supporting cryptocurrency projects. When not in front of a computer he can be found cycling up hills sporting his Pantani Jersey. He believes life should be kept simple and enjoys helping others.

members.name: Mike Lorey
members.title: Senior Front-End Architect
members.bio:
Mike is a notable software engineer, marketing technologist, and social entrepreneur. His focus lies at the intersection between raw creative and technical skills, bending the conceptual into the tangible things that other people want or need.

Mike holds an MBA in Marketing and is a self-taught programmer.

members.name: Vitalik Demin
members.title: Information Architect
members.bio: Vitalik started his career in consulting, helping companies around the world optimize their business models, design technology solutions and improve customer service. He holds an MBA in Strategic Management and Marketing from the University of St. Thomas, Minneapolis MN. Vitalik's biggest passion is User Experience. He strongly believes in simplicity and applies this belief while building all of his products and services.

members.name: Nathan King
members.title: Information Architect
members.bio:
Nathan spent the past 9 years developing virtual & physical payment platforms, RESTful API services and subscription systems for global household names such as Samsung, ODEON Cinemas and Microsoft.

While building on his experiences and skillset, Nathan has proven to take great pride and fulfillment in his customer & client relations whether technical, business or otherwise.

members.name: Rosario Pabst
members.title: Operations & Marketing Director
members.bio: Rosario has over 12 years experience as a technology project manager for satellite, aircraft, and software systems. She has demonstrated expertise in all aspects of project management, leading cross-functional teams, and implementing both Agile and Lean methods. Rosario has a M.S. in Systems Engineering and the PMP certification.

members.name: Jonathan Teplitsky
members.title: Marketing Analyst
members.bio: Jonathan holds a MBA from Harvard Business School and has marketing experience at Amazon.com, Uber, and Accenture. As a former Army officer, Jonathan led humanitarian assistance missions in Djiobuti, Uganda and Tanzania. He’s also the founder of several retail startups focusing on technology and travel. He's passionate about ZenCash and looking forward to making an impact.

members.name: James Coleman-Powell
members.title: Marketing Technology Lead
members.bio: James is an IT project manager coming from a creative background. He has a passion for all things technical, and enjoys the challenge of breaking things down to understand how they work. Based in the UK, James is an active participant in the blockchain/cryptocurrency community and in his free time, enjoys traveling and other related adventures with his family.

members.name: Medar
members.title: Grassroots Marketing Associate
members.bio: Crypto enthusiast since 2012, core believer in privacy rights and father of two. Front-end developer. Enjoys spreading knowledge about ZenCash and focus marketing at the grassroots level. In his downtime, spending time in nature and learning new things.

members.name: Linda Bucksey
members.title: Graphic Designer
members.bio: Linda is a passionate graphic designer with 'can do' attitude. She has 8 years experience working on web and print projects across EMEAI regions. She loves to travel and always are up for new challenges.

members.name: Crypto Media Hub
members.title: Brand, Social Media, Ads
members.bio: Crypto Media Hub is a leading cryptocurrency marketing firm with deep expertise in multimedia marketing, advertising, and growth hacking. The firm was founded in 2015 by Tatiana Moroz, an active member of the bitcoin community; the ZenCash support team includes Chief Marketing Officer Cally Ulbricht, who has a track record of proven results for new-to-market companies, and cypherpunk Chief Technology Officer Brian Sovryn.

members.name: Philippe Fürst
members.title: Program Manager
members.bio: After getting his diploma in mechanical engineering, Philippe became project manager for brown and greenfield plant extensions and new buildings. His profession is very diversified as he is working in various industries. That is also one of the main reasons why crypto projects appeal to him as they are also multi discipline: finances, coding, hardware, governance, etc. - it never gets boring. Philippe believes in ZenCash as a project who wants to develop a sustainable crypto economy for creating real innovative value. With his background in project management he matches perfectly for reinforcing our operations team.

members.name: Kamila Bureš-Haller
members.title: Program Manager
members.bio: Kamila has a M.Sc. degree in Dynamics and Mechatronics and has experience in leading and R&D projects through the product lifecycle. She has great interest in everything crypto and blockchain technology especially ZenCash. Kamila is highly proficient in drilling, mining rig assembly, network configuration, modifying GPU BIOS, and programming. Kamila is ecstatic to contribute her skills to community focused projects.

members.name: Said Mammadov
members.title: Finance Manager
members.bio: Said’s background is in investment finance. He started his career as a financial analyst and a stock trader on Wall Street. Said’s focus has been investing in emerging markets, he co-founded several investment funds catering to financial institutions and high-net-worth individuals. He has traveled extensively performing company valuations and investing internationally. He is currently pursuing an MBA degree in finance at the University of South Carolina, he is a Level 3 CFA Candidate. His interests are in data analytics and crypto currencies.

members.name: Dean Steinbeck
members.title: General Counsel
members.bio: Dean Steinbeck is a corporate attorney with a focus on data privacy and technology. He has over a decade of experience representing traditional VC-backed software development companies, most recently serving as General Counsel to TigerConnect, a secure and regulatory compliant communication platform used in over 4,000 healthcare facilities. Dean holds a JD from UC Berkeley School of Law and a MSc in Accounting & Finance from the London School of Economics.

members.name: Rowan Stone
members.title: Business Development Director
members.bio:
Rowan is an experienced business manager who owns and operates a mid-sized mining operation in Scotland.

With a background in mechanical engineering and IT as well as business development and commercial management, Rowan brings a wealth of experience to the Zen Organisation.

members.name: Davit Mrelashvili
members.title: Region Lead: CIS & Eastern Europe
members.bio:
Davit is a seasoned business executive with and entrepreneur originally from Georgia. He has a vast experience in working with post-Soviet states, ranging from exporting used German cars to there as his side business during residency training, to negotiating clinical trials in Georgia, Russia and Ukraine, as part of his Chief Medical Officer duties in a biomedical startup.

Davit has both MD and MBA degrees, and graduated from the Singularity University executive program. He has increased his involvement in future technologies and fintech, and is passionate about making the economy more individualized, efficient, and friction-free.

members.name: Arno Pfefferling
members.title: Region Lead: Central Europe
members.bio:
Arno was born, raised and now works in the Free State of Saxony (Germany) as a manufacturing engineer. His career path is placed in the semiconductor industry for more than 5 years, which gives him a direct view in the fabrication of leading edge integrated circuits.

To keep high integrity and enable continuous improvement in manufacturing processes, Arno gained a B. Eng. in Microtechnology and M.Sc. in Electronic- and Sensormaterials from the Technical University Bergakademie Freiberg. The will to break technology boundaries naturally brought him to blockchain technology, which he views as a game-changing opportunity for society.

members.name: Andreas Widerøe
members.title: Region Lead: Scandinavia & Northern Europe
members.bio: Andreas is an IT professional and an entrepreneur. He studied computer science at the University of Oslo before he started working as a technical engineer and hostmaster for a well known ISP in Norway. He went on to become a senior consultant and CTO for a second and third company. Besides this he is an entrepreneur and have started several companies over the years ranging from IT and media to real estate. Today he works as the CEO of young consultancy firm specializing in the new EU privacy law (GDPR). He is also an avid skateboarder and surfer.

members.name: Levis Caycedo
members.title: Region Lead: Latin America
members.bio: After graduating from the University of Florida with a bachelor's degree in industrial engineering, Levis spent the next 12 years as a project engineer and project manager in the U.S. Air Force. After separating from the Air Force, Levis joined an engineering consulting firm advising the Air Force on strategy for space and launch acquisitions. Recently while working on his Finance MBA at UCLA Anderson, Levis became extremely passionate about crypto currencies and began contributing to the Zen team as a part time intern. Now Levis is joining the Zen team full time to contribute his project management and strategy experience to grow the Zen community in Latin America.

members.name: Jane Lippencott
members.title: Academic Programs Lead
members.bio: Jane is co-founder of ZenCash and a champion of community building and cryptoeconomics. She is involved in various projects that leverage blockchain technology to provide the network infrastructure necessary for people to securely express themselves and collaboratively build value. She believes in the power of human choice, that all people have a right to personal privacy, that decentralized (peer to peer) networks and governance models (done right) will lead to global reallocation of wealth and power. Her experience ranges from financial analysis in asset and wealth management to marketing, strategy, innovation, and partnerships in venture capital and FinTech startups.

members.name: Alex Zabuga
members.title: Country Representative: Russia
members.bio: After experiencing bureaucracy of a post-soviet state firsthand, Alex realized the need for an alternate banking and private peer-to-peer economy. Alex’s formal background is in science and IT. He is a supporter of independent journalism, such as zona.media. Alex's hope is to leverage blockchain technology to make a difference in the world. Competitive by nature he plans to push ZenCash to it's potential.

members.name: Luca Cermelli
members.title: Country Manager: Italy
members.bio: Luca has a Master's Degree in Economics and is passionate about mathematics and technology.  After completing his studies in Denmark, Luca moved to Germany for a Community Manager position in a videogame company of 5000+ employees. He then became the Marketing Manager of a leading software company. With several years of activity in the blockchain industry, and always willing to help, Luca became a reference point in the Italian contest of crypto enthusiasts and is excited to bring his experience to ZenCash!

members.name: Angie Villarreal
members.title: Country Manager: Mexico
members.bio: Angie is using her  background in Industrial & Systems Engineering by Monterrey Institute of Technology and Higher Education (ITESM University) to have a great impact in the cryptoworld, which she’s devoted herself to in the past years. Her focus areas are Project Management, Business Development, and Strategic Planning. She’s a people person and believes life is about continuously learning and listening to people. She loves challenges and change!

members.name: Ruben Elizondo
members.title: Country Representative: Mexico
members.bio: Ruben is a Mechatronic Engineer and have worked in international companies such as John Deere and Heineken, working as a PLC programmer and as a Design Engineer. He has a keen interest in cryptocurrencies and state of the art technologies, always eager to be learning new things, passionate on how things work and solving engineering problems. Nowadays Ruben's attention is headed towards blockchain to witness and form part of this revolutionary technology.

members.name: Taiga Ikuta
members.title: Country Representative: Japan
members.bio:
Taiga is a freelance translator and writer. After dropping out of Keio University, he set out to travel abroad to discover different cultures and the beauty the world has to offer. His natural curiosity then led him to the crypto industry, which he believes has the potential to bring about the positive paradigm shift in the way our society operates.

Currently he is registered with Glova and Rozetta, translation agencies based in Tokyo, working on various types of documents ranging from textbooks to magazine articles to government publications.

members.name: Sebastian Dienst
members.title: Country Representative: Japan
members.bio:
After completing an apprenticeship as IT Systems Engineer in Germany and working in the IT sector for overall 10 years, he decided to study automotive engineering with main focus on electronics and IT implementation.

Things turned out slightly different as he became more interested and involved in mechanical engineering during studies. He realized his dream to work and live in Japan since 2012. With the growing popularity of blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies, he introduced himself to IT and is focusing on mining and researching blockchain. He is committed to spread the ZenCash message in Japan.

members.name: Jonghun Hong
members.title: Country Representative: Korea
members.bio:
Jonghun is a Mechanical Engineer with experience in IOT, MCU programming, application programming, mechanical design, and digital circuit design.

He is interested in a wide range of fields and has always been naturally attracted to innovative technologies like blockchain, which is how he became aware of ZenCash.

Outside of reppin’ Zen in Korea, Jonghun is leading the development of a 3D printed filament recycling device that he is in the process of registering patents for.

members.name: Hugh Ayara
members.title: Country Representative: Kenya
members.bio: An adrenaline junkie and sustainable development living crusader with unquenchable thirst for digital marketing expertise of 4 years keeping at the forefront of digital trends. He is also passionate about community development.

members.name: Charles Hoskinson
members.title: Strategic Advisor
members.bio: Charles is the CEO of IOHK, the blockchain industry’s leading R&D firm. He is a technology entrepreneur and mathematician, co-founder of Bitshares, Ethereum, and IOHK. Charles was the founding chairman of the Bitcoin Foundation’s education committee and established the Cryptocurrency Research Group in September of 2013. His current projects focus on education of cryptocurrency topics, evangelism of decentralization and making cryptographic tools easier to use for the mainstream.

members.name: Steven Nerayoff
members.title: Strategic Advisor
members.bio: Steven is an entrepreneur, disruptor, and venture capitalist interested in smart cities, technology startups, and blockchain. He has tremendous industry experience supporting Ethereum, Lisk, and Zcash. Steve is also the Founder of CloudParc, a disruptive smart-city platform using machine vision and AI.
